00051 
00052 // motion functions
00053 
00054 
00055 unsigned int ShaftCountLeft = 0;
00056 unsigned int ShaftCountRight = 0;
00057 unsigned int ShaftCountMax = 10;
00058 unsigned int Degrees; //to accept angle in degrees for turning
00059 
00060 unsigned int completeBlack = 0;
00061 
00062 
00063 
00064 //SR for left position encoder
00065 ISR(INT4_vect)
00066 {
00067  ShaftCountLeft++; //increment left shaft position count
00068  if(ShaftCountLeft > ShaftCountMax)
00069  {
00070   completeBlack = 1;
00071  }
00072 }
00073 
00074 //ISR for right position encoder
00075 ISR(INT5_vect)
00076 {
00077  ShaftCountRight++; //increment right shaft position count
00078  if(ShaftCountRight > ShaftCountMax)
00079  {
00080   completeBlack = 1;
00081  }
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 void motion_pin_config (void)
00086 {
00087  DDRA = DDRA | 0x0F;
00088  PORTA = PORTA & 0xF0;
00089  DDRL = DDRL | 0x18;   //Setting PL3 and PL4 pins as output for PWM generation
00090  PORTL = PORTL | 0x18; //PL3 and PL4 pins are for velocity control using PWM.
00091 }
00092 
00093 //Function to configure INT4 (PORTE 4) pin as input for the left position encoder
00094 void left_encoder_pin_config (void)
00095 {
00096  DDRE  = DDRE & 0xEF;  //Set the direction of the PORTE 4 pin as input
00097  PORTE = PORTE | 0x10; //Enable internal pullup for PORTE 4 pin
00098 }
00099 
00100 //Function to configure INT5 (PORTE 5) pin as input for the right position encoder
00101 void right_encoder_pin_config (void)
00102 {
00103  DDRE  = DDRE & 0xDF;  //Set the direction of the PORTE 4 pin as input
00104  PORTE = PORTE | 0x20; //Enable internal pullup for PORTE 4 pin
00105 }
00106 
00107 void init_ports()
00108 {
00109  motion_pin_config(); //robot motion pins config
00110  left_encoder_pin_config(); //left encoder pin config
00111  right_encoder_pin_config(); //right encoder pin config 
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00115 void left_position_encoder_interrupt_init (void) //Interrupt 4 enable
00116 {
00117  cli(); //Clears the global interrupt
00118  EICRB = EICRB | 0x02; // INT4 is set to trigger with falling edge
00119  EIMSK = EIMSK | 0x10; // Enable Interrupt INT4 for left position encoder
00120  sei();   // Enables the global interrupt 
00121 }
00122 
00123 void right_position_encoder_interrupt_init (void) //Interrupt 5 enable
00124 {
00125  cli(); //Clears the global interrupt
00126  EICRB = EICRB | 0x08; // INT5 is set to trigger with falling edge
00127  EIMSK = EIMSK | 0x20; // Enable Interrupt INT5 for right position encoder
00128  sei();   // Enables the global interrupt 
00129 }
00130 
00131 
00132 //Function used for setting motor's direction
00133 void motion_set (unsigned char Direction)
00134 {
00135  unsigned char PortARestore = 0;
00136 
00137  Direction &= 0x0F;    // removing upper nibbel as it is not needed
00138  PortARestore = PORTA;    // reading the PORTA's original status
00139  PortARestore &= 0xF0;    // setting lower direction nibbel to 0
00140  PortARestore |= Direction;  // adding lower nibbel for direction command and restoring the PORTA status
00141  PORTA = PortARestore;    // setting the command to the port
00142 
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00146 /*#define MOVE_FWD forward()
00147 #define MOVE_REV back()
00148 #define MOVE_LEFT left()
00149 #define MOVE_RIGHT right()
00150 #define MOVE_SOFT_RIGHT soft_right()
00151 #define MOVE_SOFT_LEFT soft_left()
00152 #define MOVE_INPLACE_RIGHT inplace_right()
00153 #define MOVE_INPLACE_LEFT inplace_left()*/
00154 
00155 
00156 void MOVE_FWD(void) //both wheels forward
00157 {
00158   motion_set(0x06);
00159 }
00160 
00161 void MOVE_REV(void) //both wheels backward
00162 {
00163   motion_set(0x09);
00164 }
00165 
00166 void MOVE_LEFT(void) //Left wheel backward, Right wheel forward
00167 {
00168   motion_set(0x05);
00169 }
00170 
00171 void MOVE_RIGHT(void) //Left wheel forward, Right wheel backward
00172 {
00173   motion_set(0x0A);
00174 }
00175 
00176 void MOVE_SOFT_LEFT (void) //Left wheel stationary, Right wheel forward
00177 {
00178  motion_set(0x04);
00179 }
00180 
00181 void MOVE_SOFT_RIGHT (void) //Left wheel forward, Right wheel is stationary
00182 {
00183  motion_set(0x02);
00184 }
00185 
00186 void MOVE_INPLACE_LEFT(void) //Left wheel backward, right wheel stationary
00187 {
00188  motion_set(0x01);
00189 }
00190 
00191 void MOVE_INPLACE_RIGHT (void) //Left wheel stationary, Right wheel backward
00192 {
00193  motion_set(0x08);
00194 }
00195 
00196 void STOP (void)
00197 {
00198   motion_set(0x00);
00199 }
00200 
00201 void angle_rotate(unsigned int Degrees)
00202 {
00203  float ReqdShaftCount = 0;
00204  unsigned long int ReqdShaftCountInt = 0;
00205 
00206  ReqdShaftCount = (float) Degrees/ 4.090; // division by resolution to get shaft count
00207  ReqdShaftCountInt = (unsigned int) ReqdShaftCount;
00208  ShaftCountRight = 0; 
00209  ShaftCountLeft = 0; 
00210 
00211  while (1)
00212  {
00213   if((ShaftCountRight >= ReqdShaftCountInt) | (ShaftCountLeft >= ReqdShaftCountInt))
00214   break;
00215  }
00216  STOP(); //Stop action
00217 }
00218 
00219 //Function used for moving robot forward by specified distance
00220 
00221 void linear_distance_mm(unsigned int DistanceInMM)
00222 {
00223  float ReqdShaftCount = 0;
00224  unsigned long int ReqdShaftCountInt = 0;
00225 
00226  ReqdShaftCount = (float) DistanceInMM / 5.338; // division by resolution to get shaft count
00227  ReqdShaftCountInt = (unsigned long int) ReqdShaftCount;
00228   
00229  ShaftCountRight = 0; 
00230  ShaftCountLeft = 0;
00231  while(1)
00232  {
00233   if((ShaftCountRight >= ReqdShaftCountInt) | (ShaftCountLeft >= ReqdShaftCountInt))
00234   {
00235    break;
00236   }
00237  } 
00238  STOP(); //Stop action
00239 }
00240 
00241 
00242 void forward_mm(unsigned int DistanceInMM)
00243 {
00244  MOVE_FWD();
00245  linear_distance_mm(DistanceInMM);
00246 }
00247 
00248 void back_mm(unsigned int DistanceInMM)
00249 {
00250  MOVE_REV();
00251  linear_distance_mm(DistanceInMM);
00252 }
00253 
00254 
00255 
00256 void RIGHT_TURN_BY(int Degree)
00257 {
00258  MOVE_RIGHT();
00259  angle_rotate(Degree);
00260  STOP();
00261 }
00262 
00263 void LEFT_TURN_BY(int Degree)
00264 {
00265  MOVE_LEFT();
00266  angle_rotate(Degree);
00267  STOP();
00268 }

00273 // Timer 5 initialised in PWM mode for velocity control
00274 // Prescale:64
00275 // PWM 8bit fast, TOP=0x00FF
00276 // Timer Frequency:674.988Hz
00277 void timer5_init()
00278 {
00279  TCCR5B = 0x00; //Stop
00280  TCNT5H = 0xFF; //Counter higher 8-bit value to which OCR5xH value is compared with
00281  TCNT5L = 0x01; //Counter lower 8-bit value to which OCR5xH value is compared with
00282  OCR5AH = 0x00; //Output compare register high value for Left Motor
00283  OCR5AL = 0xFF; //Output compare register low value for Left Motor
00284  OCR5BH = 0x00; //Output compare register high value for Right Motor
00285  OCR5BL = 0xFF; //Output compare register low value for Right Motor
00286  OCR5CH = 0x00; //Output compare register high value for Motor C1
00287  OCR5CL = 0xFF; //Output compare register low value for Motor C1
00288  TCCR5A = 0xA9; /*{COM5A1=1, COM5A0=0; COM5B1=1, COM5B0=0; COM5C1=1 COM5C0=0}
00289         For Overriding normal port functionalit to OCRnA outputs.
00290          {WGM51=0, WGM50=1} Along With WGM52 in TCCR5B for Selecting FAST PWM 8-bit Mode*/
00291  
00292  TCCR5B = 0x0B; //WGM12=1; CS12=0, CS11=1, CS10=1 (Prescaler=64)
00293 }
00294 
00295 // Function for robot velocity control
00296 // Make sure that you pass only unsigned char value.
00297 
00298 
00299 void velocity (unsigned char left_motor, unsigned char right_motor)
00300 {
00301  OCR5AL = (unsigned char)left_motor;
00302  OCR5BL = (unsigned char)right_motor;
00303 }
00304 
00305 
00306 void MOTOR_LEFT_SPEED(int val)
00307 {
00308     if ( val > 254 )   //limiting the max velocity
00309     val = 255; 
00310     OCR5AL = (unsigned char) val;
00311 }
00312 
00313 void MOTOR_RIGHT_SPEED(int val)
00314 {
00315   if ( val > 254 )     //limiting the max velocity
00316    val = 255;
00317   OCR5BL = (unsigned char) val;
00318 }
